title: [2] Skippy's "Journal"
contents: Lookie here!
So we's see some of Brak's boys rollin' down the way.
And they's gots a BUNCH of civie's all bunched up, marchin' em down the road.
So I go get some boys, we wait, and we JUMP em!
We 'nab the civie's and book it back to camp!
When we get back, those civie's were got all softy, started thankin' us for cuttin' them lose...
Whatever.
We ask em why Brak was haulin' em off and stuff.
They's said that Brak was searching 'round, lookin' for some kinda "searchin' facility" or whatever.
They's said that there's somethin' MEAN inside, some kinda weapon from before the 'big booms.
Now, we's about to let them off the hook.
But my buddy Ricky, he had's a GOOD idea!
If Brak's lookin' for some weapon...
Well...
We should's get it FIRST!
That Brak jerk's already got all his crazy choppers, his stupid buses, an' whatnot.
But we's could use some cool new weapons! We need's em more!
So we start pokin' em for this searchin' facility.
But then they got all clammy, didn' wanna tell us nothin' more.
Then I got all mad, started yellin' maybe punched one of em, I dunno.
Anyways, Ricky took some of em up to the ol' ruins. See if any of them start squeakin' from Mr. Burny. Heh.
But Ricky put ME in "time's out", or whatever.
So now I'm stuck here, writin' in THIS thing...
Hope ol' Ricky gets back soon, I wanna see what's in that searchin' place!
I bet there'll be a big ol' cannon in there, and the cannon'll shoot blue fire or somethin'!
